snippet: Mr. Bush made clear in an interview that aired on Sunday that he did not believe in constitutional protection for same-sex marriages and left out his past call for “respect” for gay couples.
abstract: Mr. Bush made clear in an interview that aired on Sunday that he did not believe in constitutional protection for same-sex marriages and left out his past call for “respect” for gay couples.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Takes Tougher Stance Against Same-Sex Marriage

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
